articles.title: Meta in $27 billion financing deal with Blue Owl Capital for Louisiana data center
articles.description: (Reuters) -Meta has struck a $27 billion financing deal with Blue Owl Capital to fund its biggest data center project globally, as large technology companies race to build out the infrastructure needed to power their artificial intelligence ambitions.

articles.title: Nearly 3K seats vacant; Outdated courses keep students away from agri-studies
articles.description: The latest admission data from the State Common Entrance Test (CET) Cell shows that out of 16,829 available seats in agriculture-related undergraduate courses including agricultural engineering, food technology, biotechnology, community science, forestry, and horticulture only 13,892 have been filled this year | Mumbai news
articles.content: Mumbai: State agricultural colleges are facing a sharp decline in admissions this year, raising concerns about the future of the state’s once-promising agricultural education sector. According to official data, nearly 3,000 seats in undergraduate agr... [3387 chars]

articles.title: OpenAI Unveils Atlas: The Browser Set to Challenge Google's Reign
articles.description: OpenAI has launched a new web browser named Atlas, positioning itself as a competitor to Google's Chrome. The browser, initially available on Apple laptops, will soon expand to other operating systems. Atlas integrates AI technology for a revolutionary internet experience, amidst potential challenges in the market.
articles.content: OpenAI, renowned for its AI innovations, has made a bold move into the browsing sector by launching Atlas, a web browser poised to compete with Google's dominant Chrome. This initiative is part of a strategic effort by OpenAI to bolster its reach and... [800 chars]

articles.title: How to prepare for outages that impact our online lives
articles.description: Consumers may not realize how many platforms they use rely on the same back-end technology.
articles.content:
“Don’t put all your eggs in one digital basket,” said Lee McKnight, an associate professor at Syracuse University’s School of Information Studies, noting these kinds of outages aren’t going away anytime soon.
So what, if anything, can you do to prepa... [4447 chars]
